column4: Specifies payment terms: payments are made within 30 days of month-end if the earned balance is $300 or more; if less than $300 but greater than $10, payment is within 45 days of calendar year-end or when balance exceeds $300. Upon termination, payment is within 90 days.
column5: Each Party (""Payor"") shall pay the other Party (""Payee"") their share of Net Revenue as described in Section 5.1 above (i.e., with respect to Provider as the Payee, the Provider Net Revenue; with respect to RHEI as the Payee, the RHEI Net Revenue) in any month, within 30 days following of the end of the month in which such revenue was received, provided that the Payee's earned balance is Three Hundred Dollars ($300.00) or more. If Payee's earned balance is less than Three Hundred Dollars ($300.00) but greater than Ten Dollars ($10.00), the Payor will pay Payee's earned balance within 45 days following the end of the calendar year, or the end of the calendar month in which the Payee's earned balance exceeds Three Hundred Dollars ($300.00), whichever comes first. In the event that this Agreement is terminated, Payor shall pay Payee's earned balance to Payee within 90 days after the end of the calendar month in which the Agreement has been terminated. All amounts owing to a Payee under this Agreement shall constitute a debt owed by Payor to Payee and Payee shall have no ownership or other interest in any share of Net Revenue first received by Payor.
